org.sakaiproject.authz.api

Interface FunctionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FunctionManagerComponent

    public interface FunctionManager

    FunctionManager is the API for the service that manages security function registrations from the various Sakai applications.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getRegisteredFunctions()
      Access all the registered functions.
      List<String> getRegisteredFunctions(String prefix)
      Access all the registered functions that begin with the string.
      List<String> getRegisteredUserMutableFunctions()
      Access all the registered functions intended to be user-settable
      List<String> getRegisteredUserMutableFunctions(String prefix)
      Access all the registered functions intended to be user-settable that begin with the string.
      void registerFunction(String function)
      Register an authz function
      void registerFunction(String function, boolean userMutable)
      Register an authz function

    • Method Detail

      • registerFunction

        void registerFunction(String function)
        Register an authz function
        Parameters:
        function - The function name.

      • registerFunction

        void registerFunction(String function,
                    boolean userMutable)
        Register an authz function
        Parameters:
        function - The function name.
        userMutable - If true, this function is intended to be settable by users with update rights in the authzgroup, for example through a tool permissions widget or web service. Setting this to false indicates that tool UIs or web services should not allow this permission to be altered by a user, but does not enforce this in Role.allowFunction() or Role.disallowFunction().

      • getRegisteredFunctions

        List<String> getRegisteredFunctions()
        Access all the registered functions.
        Returns:
        A List (String) of registered functions.

      • getRegisteredFunctions

        List<String> getRegisteredFunctions(String prefix)
        Access all the registered functions that begin with the string.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix pattern to find.
        Returns:
        A List (String) of registered functions that begin with the string.

      • getRegisteredUserMutableFunctions

        List<String> getRegisteredUserMutableFunctions()
        Access all the registered functions intended to be user-settable
        Returns:
        A List (String) of registered functions.

      • getRegisteredUserMutableFunctions

        List<String> getRegisteredUserMutableFunctions(String prefix)
        Access all the registered functions intended to be user-settable that begin with the string.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix pattern to find.
        Returns:
        A List (String) of registered functions that begin with the string.
